Html:
Hello. I followed all pre-configured steps listed at https://sqlpowerdoc.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Guide%20For%20PowerShell%20Beginners. I tried executing Example #1 but I recieved the following error message - Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.


WARNING: Error querying for A records from DNS Server xx.xx.xx.xxx for domain 'xzy.com': The RPC server is
unavailable. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x800706BA)


Thanks

Looks like the account you're running Power Doc with doesn't have the necessary permissions to make a DNS query using the DNS WMI provider. Try this link and see if that resolves your issue:

Stack Overflow: What permissions are required for MS DNS WMI API?

--Kendal
